metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26555 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Bluetooth legacy BR/EDR PIN code pairing in Bluetooth Core Specification1.0B through 5.2 may permit an unauthenticated nearby device to spoof theBD_ADDR of the peer device to complete pairing without knowledge of thePIN.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
